earl s. richardson library.description: The Earl S. Richardson Library provides comprehensive research support, print and digital collections, study spaces, and multimedia services for all MSU students and faculty.

features.name: Library Card Registration
features.detail: Register your MSU BearCard as your library card to access resources both on and off campus.

features.name: Research
features.detail: Borrow books and reference materials from our library and others in the University of Maryland Library System.

features.name: READ (Online Collections)
features.detail: View online collections, periodicals, and databases.

features.name: Special Collections Visit
features.detail: Visit the Beulah Davis Research Room for archival materials and rare books.

features.name: Kanopy Streaming
features.detail: Watch movies, documentaries, and award-winning films for free via Kanopy.
